name: Vampire Wars Symphony of Darkness Episode 1
name_original: Vampire Wars Symphony of Darkness Episode 1
description:
London England 1889 The Britannia Empire is ruled over by Her Royal Highness Queen Victoria.As the moon rises an evil force stalks the streets.
In order to fight this evil Queen Victoria requests help from a shadow organisation that is formed by the beautiful Countess Vladimir the last royal Vampire.

Based on the Comic by AJ Duggan This manga style adventure mixes steampunk and Lovecraft horror with an anime feel.

Voice acted by Kelsey Ellison
